heading.recievePayment: You will receive your payment(s) of amount
heading.confirmation: in your account(s). A confirmation (Email/SMS) has been sent to you.
heading.thankyouText: An Email / SMS confirmation has been sent to your contact information on file. You will receive your payment in your bank account linked with Zelle within 1-2 hours. For future payments, you can change your payment preference anytime.

error.selectonePayment: Please select atleast one payment amount.

dashboard.verifyPaymentText: You have received payment authentication request, please select the payment to authenticate
dashboard.codeReceived: Kindly enter six digit code received on

verifySuccessMsg.ach: Your payment is successfully authorized. You will receive your payment to your bank account within {{timeRequired}} business days. For future payments, you can change your payment preference anytime.
verifySuccessMsg.check: Your payment is successfully authorized. You will receive your check within {{timeRequired}} business days. For future payments, you can change your payment preference anytime.
verifySuccessMsg.zelle: Your payment is successfully authorized. You will receive your payment in your bank account linked with Zelle usually in less than an hour. For future payments, you can change your payment preference anytime.
verifySuccessMsg.directDeposit: Your payment is successfully authorized. You will receive your payment in the account linked to your debit card within less than an hour. For future payments, you can change your payment preference anytime.
verifySuccessMsg.paypal: Your payment is successfully authorized. You will receive your payment in your PayPal account in less than an hour. For future payments, you can change your payment preference anytime.

enterCode: Please enter the six digit verification code received on {{contact}}
enterCodeBoth: Please enter the six digit verification code received on both {{mobile}} and {{email}}
retryAfter60: This can take a few seconds. Retry after 60 seconds.

nonCdmAuth.paymentReceivedHeading: Woohoo! Your have received payment of ${{paymentAmount}}
